content.question: An object is initially at rest when, starting at time <math alttext="t equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>, a net force <math alttext="vector F sub net" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mover><mi>F</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mi>net</mi></msub></math> that varies in time is exerted on the object, where <math alttext="vector F sub net equals, F sub 0, end sub, times the sine of open parenthesis, omega t, close parenthesis, times i hat, plus F sub 0, end sub, times the cosine of open parenthesis, omega t, close parenthesis, times j hat" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mover accent="true"><mi>F</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mtext>net</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>ω</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mover accent="true"><mi>i</mi><mo>^</mo></mover><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>ω</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mover accent="true"><mi>j</mi><mo>^</mo></mover></mstyle></math>. What is the impulse delivered to the object between <math alttext="t equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> and a later time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="F sub 0, end sub, times omega, times open bracket, the cosine of open parenthesis, omega t, close parenthesis, times i hat, plus the sine of open parenthesis, omega t, close parenthesis, times j hat, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>ω</mi><mrow><mo>[</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>ω</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mover accent="true"><mi>i</mi><mo>^</mo></mover><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>ω</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mover accent="true"><mi>j</mi><mo>^</mo></mover><mo>]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="F sub 0, end sub, times omega, times open bracket, the cosine of open parenthesis, omega t, close parenthesis, times i hat, minus the sine of open parenthesis, omega t, close parenthesis, times j hat, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>ω</mi><mrow><mo>[</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>ω</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mover accent="true"><mi>i</mi><mo>^</mo></mover><mo>-</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>ω</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mover accent="true"><mi>j</mi><mo>^</mo></mover><mo>]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator F sub 0, and denominator omega, end fraction, times open bracket, the negative of the cosine of open parenthesis, omega t, close parenthesis, times i hat, plus the sine of open parenthesis, omega t, close parenthesis, times j hat, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle><mi>ω</mi></mfrac><mrow><mo>[</mo><mo>-</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>ω</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mover accent="true"><mi>i</mi><mo>^</mo></mover><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>ω</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mover accent="true"><mi>j</mi><mo>^</mo></mover><mo>]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator F sub 0, and denominator omega, end fraction, times open bracket, open parenthesis, 1 minus the cosine of open parenthesis, omega t, close parenthesis, close parenthesis, times i hat, plus the sine of open parenthesis, omega t, close parenthesis, times j hat, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle><mi>ω</mi></mfrac><mrow><mo>[</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>-</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>ω</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mover accent="true"><mi>i</mi><mo>^</mo></mover><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>ω</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mover accent="true"><mi>j</mi><mo>^</mo></mover><mo>]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator F sub 0, and denominator omega, end fraction, times open bracket, open parenthesis, 1 minus the cosine of open parenthesis, omega t, close parenthesis, close parenthesis, times i hat, plus the sine of open parenthesis, omega t, close parenthesis, times j hat, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle><mi>ω</mi></mfrac><mrow><mo>[</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>-</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>ω</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mover accent="true"><mi>i</mi><mo>^</mo></mover><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>ω</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mover accent="true"><mi>j</mi><mo>^</mo></mover><mo>]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
